Welcome to my personal site! I am a medical doctor attempting to transition to bioinformatics. I am currently doing my PhD _and_ post-doc in the Leiden University Medical Center, where I use CyTOF, RNA-Seq, and scRNA-Seq to improve our understanding in immune response upon parasitic infection and vaccination.
